description.text: Pancake 1 short-focus 6DoF all-in-one VR system won the “VR/AR Innovation Gold Award at the 2022 World Conference on VR Industry”

Skyworth was listed in the “2018-2019 Global Top 10 TV Brands.”
China Railway Express – Skyworth Express first departed from Chengdu.
